bug.author: dynamicwebpaige
bug.description: Documentation and tutorials are a critical piece of every open-source project, and a developer's first impression of the product. The purpose of this issue will be to track the creation, migration, and translations for TensorFlow 2.0 docs. For more information, check out the example notebooks we have available <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/tree/master/site/en/r2>here</denchmark-link> , as well as the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/guide/upgrade.md>TF 2.0 upgrade guide</denchmark-link> and the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/r2/guide/effective_tf2.md>Effective 2.0 Style Guide</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dynamicwebpaige>@dynamicwebpaige</denchmark-link> can i know about any specific functions which needs some docs!?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/dynamicwebpaige>@dynamicwebpaige</denchmark-link> in this documentation, do we have to implement the high-level APIs without using the graph execution. Since sessions are not being used anymore.?

Tensorflow 2.x resources such as corresponding tutorials, blogs, codes and videos: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Amin-Tgz/Awesome-TensorFlow-2>https://github.com/Amin-Tgz/Awesome-TensorFlow-2</denchmark-link>
I hope to be useful

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=25366>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=25366>No</denchmark-link>
